transArray.content: It is my first time to stay at the Orange Hotel. The location of the hotel is pretty good. It is a few hundred meters away from the subway station. It is very convenient to travel. The rooms are clean and have no peculiar smell. The style is all kinds of oranges which are quite interesting. There is a small robot that can deliver food. Breakfast is buffet style and very delicious.

Dear guest, hello! Thank you for staying at the Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. As a Huazhu comfort brand, we attach great importance to the stay experience of all guests. We also thank you very much for your recognition of the breakfast in the hotel. A good stay means a good meal. It will feel like home. I believe that with your support, we will continue to improve the quality of all aspects of the hotel. We are extremely honored that you can stay here happily! The hotel is disinfecting and cleaning every day, and the hotel has also strengthened its intelligent "contactless" service. During your stay, items needed will be delivered to the room through a robot, ensuring that the robot will be disinfected again after every use. We strive to make everyone Guests are happy to be repeat customers. The hotel is located at Gate 2 East of Badili Automobile Park. Take Metro Line 6 and exit from Haidian Wuluju Station. You can walk directly to the hotel in 3-5 minutes to ensure your travel safety and protect every guest. "Peace of mind" and "safety" are our consistent and important mission! Looking forward to your next stay! Thanks! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
